text: ==Winners== ===Book of the Year=== :Richard Holmes, Coleridge: Early Visions ===Children's Book=== *Hugh Scott, Why Weeps the Brogan? ===First Novel=== *James Hamilton-Paterson, Gerontius ===Novel=== *Lindsay Clarke, The Chymical Wedding ===Biography=== *Richard Holmes, Coleridge: Early Visions ===Poetry=== *Michael Donaghy, Shibboleth ==References== *Previous winners Category:Costa Book Awards Whitbread Whitbread Awards
title: 1989 Whitbread Awards
